dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: No solid phase and liquid phase falling to the ground during the whole well drilling. The technology of drilling fluid not falling to the ground reduces the workload of the Mud Pit, realizes zero discharge of the waste drilling fluid in the drilling process, reduces the environmental damage caused by the waste drilling fluid, and the ground is completely restored to the pre-drilling state after the completion of drilling The reuse of waste drilling fluid can also greatly reduce the cost of drilling
全井钻进过程中无废弃固相和液相落地。钻井液不落地技术减少了挖泥浆池的工作量,实现了钻井施工过程中废弃钻井液的零排放,减少了其对环境造成的损害,完钻后地面完全恢复钻前状态;废弃钻井液的重复利用,还可大幅减少钻井成本投入

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Daniu gas field is located in the border area of Shaanxi and Mongolia, belonging to the Ordos Basin. It is one of the development areas of the north China branch of the Sinopec. During the period of “Fifteen” in Daniu gas field, 723 horizontal wells are planned to be deployed, with a new gas production capacity of 66.5 × 108 m3 and a gas production capacity of 214 × 108 m3. In 2012, the DANIU gas field produced 30 × 108 m3 of natural gas per year, completed 119 horizontal wells, with an average depth of 3992.21 m and an average length of 1131.13 m, it is the first low permeability gas field to realize horizontal well scale development in China.

大牛地气田位于陕蒙交界地区，属于鄂尔多斯盆地，是 中国石油化工股份有限公司华北分公司 开发地区之一。大牛地气田“十二五”期间计划部署水平井723口，新建天然气产能66.5×108m3，天然气产量达214×108m3。2012年，按会战要求大牛地气田实现了年产天然气30×108m3，完钻水平井119口，平均完钻井深3 992.21 m，平均水平段长1 131.13 m，是国内第1个实现水平井规模开发的低渗气田。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process pertains to the extraction phase in a low permeability gas field, specifically focusing on the use of drilling fluid in the drilling operation. The state-of-the-art technology ensures no waste drilling fluid is discharged to the ground, applying a non-landfall technique that enhances environmental protection by avoiding soil and groundwater contamination and allows for the site to be restored post-drilling. Additionally, the reuse of the drilling fluid significantly diminishes operational costs. The data represents practices from the Daniu gas field which demonstrates large-scale horizontal well development and advances in natural gas extraction methodology in China.
本工业流程涉及低渗气田的开采阶段，特别是钻井操作中钻井液的使用。最新技术确保无废弃钻井液排放至地面，采用不落地技术提高了环境保护能力，避免了土壤和地下水污染并可在钻井后恢复现场。此外，钻井液的重复利用大幅降低了操作成本。该数据反映了大牛气田的实践，展示了中国天然气提取方法论的横向油井大规模开发和进步。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data users should consider this dataset specific to the DANIU gas field and it's not necessarily a representation of other fields. While appreciating the environmental benefits and cost savings of the non-landfall drilling fluid technology, users need to ensure that the context of their study aligns with the conditions and technological applicability observed in this scenario. Methodological adjustments must be made when trying to extrapolate these results to different geological or operational contexts. The reuse of drilling fluid should also be factored into lifecycle analyses as an integral part of reducing waste and resource utilization.
数据用户应将此数据集特定于大牛气田，并不必然代表其他油田。在欣赏不落地钻井液技术的环境效益和成本节约的同时，用户需要确保其研究的背景与此场景观察到的条件和技术适用性一致。在尝试将这些结果推广到不同的地质或操作环境时，必须进行方法论调整。钻井液的重复使用也应作为减少废物和资源利用的一个重要部分纳入生命周期分析。
